inputScreen.noDataDep: Please first import all data this element depends on.

scen.noScen: No scenarios loaded. Please first load a scenario

advanced.downloadTempDesc: Download temporary files from the working directory

batch_import.title: Import data
batch_import.uploadZip: Upload zip file with results here.

batch_load.title: Load Scenarios
batch_load.noData: No data was returned by your query

batch_analyze.title: Analyze Scenarios
batch_analyze.loadMsg: Please wait while the results are calculated. This may take a while.
batch_analyze.failMsg: Something went wrong while trying to run paver. If this problem persists, please contact a system administrator.

dialogNewScen.title: New scenario
dialogNewScen.desc: Please enter a name for the scenario:
dialogNewScen.badName: Please choose a valid name for the new scenario.
dialogNewScen.scenExits: The scenario name you chose does already exist. Do you want to overwrite the existing data?

dialogEditMeta.title: Edit metadata
dialogEditMeta.attachmentsExecPerm: Allow model to read this file
dialogEditMeta.attachMaxSizeError: Your attachments exceed the maximum attachment size of %s bytes.
dialogEditMeta.attachMaxNoError: The maximum number of attachments is reached. Please first remove attachments before uploading new ones.
dialogEditMeta.attachDuplicateError: An attachment with the same name already exists. Please choose another name and try again.
dialogEditMeta.attachUnknownError: An unexpected error occurred. If this problem persists, please contact the system administrator.
dialogEditMeta.errMsg: Prolems updating scenario metadata. If this problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

dialogDeleteScen.title: Delete scenario
dialogDeleteScen.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the selected scenario from the database?

removeFromUI.desc: Do you want to remove the scenario from the editor? Unsaved data will be lost!

dialogRemoveScen.title: Close scenario
dialogRemoveScen.desc: Are you sure you want to close the currently active scenario? Unsaved data might be lost!

dialogCloseScen.title: Close scenario
dialogCloseScen.desc: Are you sure you want to close the selected scenario?

dialogExistingOutput.title: Output data exists
dialogExistingOutput.desc: The scenario you want to save contains output data that may not correspond to the current input data. Do you want to discard the output data?

dialogSaveScen.title: Save scenario
dialogSaveScen.desc: Are you sure you want to save the selected scenario in the database?

dialogImport.title: Import data
dialogImport.descLocal: Choose file with data to import
dialogImport.newScenName: Choose a name for the new scenario
dialogImport.scenNameExists: The scenario name you chose does already exist. Do you want to overwrite the existing data?
dialogImport.descOverwriteInput: You already have input data loaded. Are you sure you want to overwrite this data?
dialogImport.overwriteWarning: Already imported datasets might be lost if you did not save them!

dialogLoadScen.title: Load scenario
dialogLoadScen.descNoScen: No saved scenarios could be found.
dialogLoadScen.selLoadScen: Select the scenario(s) that you want to load
dialogLoadScen.descDataError: The scenario data seems to be corrupted. Loading failed.

dialogNewCol.title: New column
dialogNewCol.desc: Please enter a name for the new column:

dialogLockScen.title: Scenario locked
dialogLockScen.desc: The scenario you want to load is currently being accessed by the user: '%s'. Please try again later.

dialogReadonly.title: No write permissions
dialogReadonly.desc: You do not have write permissions for this scenario. Do you want to save the scenario as a new scenario  instead?

dialogDownloadTmp.title: Download temporary files
dialogDownloadTmp.desc: Select the file you wish to download

dialogBatch.title: Batch configuration
dialogBatch.desc: You selected %d scenarios to be solved in batch mode. Out of these, %d scenarios have already been solved either by yourself or someone else. Do you want to solve all scenarios again or only those that have not yet been solved?

waitDialog.title: Batch run is being configured
waitDialog.desc: Please wait while the batch run is being configured.

exceedMaxNoDialog.title: Maximum number scenarios exceeded
exceedMaxNoDialog.desc: You have selected to solve %d scenarios for your batch run. This exceeds the maximum allowed number that can be solved per run (%d). Please reduce the number of scenarios and try again.

noScenSelectedDialog.title: No scenarios selected
noScenSelectedDialog.desc: You first need to select atleast one scenario that you want to solve.

badStepSizeDialog.title: Bad step size
badStepSizeDialog.desc: You specified a step size that could not be processed. Please select a valid step size and try again.

configPaverDialog.title: Select scenario comparison method
configPaverDialog.selectMethod: Which method would you like to use in order to compare your scenarios?
configPaverDialog.maxScenWarning1: You may only select up to: '%d' scenarios to load into interactive mode at once.
configPaverDialog.maxScenWarning2: Select less scenarios or use the Paver module to compare.
configPaverDialog.desc: Please select the attributes you want to compare.
configPaverDialog.delTrace: Note: The existing trace files found in the current working directory will be deleted when starting paver.
configPaverDialog.tooManySolvers: The attributes you selected amount to too many scenarios to compare (no more than %s scenarios can be compared). Please reduce the number of scenarios.
configPaverDialog.removeConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete the %s selected scenarios from the database? This action can not be undone!
configPaverDialog.removeSuccess: The selected scenarios were removed successfully.
configPaverDialog.removeError: Some error occurred while trying to remove the selected scenarios. If this problem persists, please contact a system administrator.

invalidScenDialog.title: Invalid scenarios
invalidScenDialog.desc: %d of the scenarios you want to upload are invalid (%s). Do you still want to proceed?

duplicatedScenDialog.title: Duplicated Scenarios found
duplicatedScenDialog.allDuplicated: All of the scenarios you want to import already exist in the database with the tag(s): '%s'. Do you still want to proceed?
duplicatedScenDialog.someDuplicated: %d of the scenarios you want to import already exist in the database with the tag(s): '%s'. Do you still want to proceed or only import those scenarios that do not yet exist.

dialogPaverInUse.title: Paver is already in use
dialogPaverInUse.desc: Please wait until the process is finished.

saveInputDb.title: Saving model input data in database

downloadHandler.msg: Some error occurred trying to download the file. If this error persists, please contact the system administrator.

initErrors.title: Some errors occurred
initErrors.desc: Please fix the errors mentioned below and restart the GAMS WebUI:

renderSlider.title: Incorrect input data for slider
renderSlider.desc: The value '%s' for the slider: '%s' is not of numeric type.

saveInput.title: Error saving input data
saveInput.desc: Some error occurred saving the data to the database.

readOutput.title: Error reading the results
readOutput.desc: Some error occurred reading the results that were returned from GAMS.

dataError.title: Error in data
dataError.desc: Some data error occurred. Please contact the system administrator in case this problem persists.

ddLenMismatch.title: Number of aliases and values does not match
ddLenMismatch.desc: The number of aliases for dropdown menu: '%s' does not match the number of values.

fetchDataset.title: Error reading dataset
fetchDataset.desc: Some error occurred fetching the dataset: '%s' from the database.
fetchDataset.badColName: The column(s) '%s' was not found in the dataset : '%s'
fetchDataset.noData: Dataset: '%s' could not be loaded. Please make sure the dataset actually contains data.

GAMSInput.title: Errors occurred writing input files
GAMSInput.desc: Some errors occurred writing GAMS input files:
GAMSInput.excelRead: Some error occurred reading the file: '%s'.
GAMSInput.badInputData: The GAMS input dataset: '%s' is not valid. Please check the format of the data you wish to import.
GAMSInput.writeCsv: Some error occurred writing csv file: '%s'.

gamsExec.title: Error executing GAMS
gamsExec.desc: Some error occurred while executing GAMS.

readLog.title: Error reading log file
readLog.desc: Some error occurred reading the GAMS log file.

readLst.title: Error reading listing file
readLst.desc: Some error occurred reading the GAMS listing file.
readLst.fileSize: The lst file you are trying to read is too large to be displayed. Please download the lst file to access it.

saveScen.title: Error saving scenario
saveScen.desc: An error occurred while trying to save the scenario.

loadScen.title: Error loading scenario
loadScen.desc: Some error occurred loading the selected scenarios.

deleteScen.title: Error deleting scenario
deleteScen.desc: Some error occurred deleting the scenario. If this error persists please contact the system administrator.

renderTable.title: Error rendering table
renderTable.desc: Some error occurred rendering table for output data: '%s'.

renderGraph.title: Error rendering graph
renderGraph.desc: Some error occurred rendering graph for output data: '%s'.

blankScenName.title: No name entered
blankScenName.desc: Please select a valid name for the scenario you want to save.

maxScen.title: Maximum number of scenarios reached
maxScen.desc: You have reached the maximum number of scenarios that you can load concurrently. Please first remove some scenarios before you import new ones.

lockScen.title: Error setting/removing scenario lock
lockScen.desc: Some error occurred while locking or unlocking the currently active scenario.

paverFileLoad.desc: Data could not be loaded for this category.
